name: flail
effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power varies inversely with the user's proportional remaining HP.

64 * current HP / max HP | Power
-----------------------: | ----:
 0– 1                    |  200
 2– 5                    |  150
 6–12                    |  100
13–21                    |   80
22–42                    |   40
43–64                    |   20

flavor_text_entries.gold-silver:
Stronger if the
user's HP is low.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
Stronger if the
user's HP is low.
flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Inflicts more damage when
the user’s HP is down.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Inflicts more damage when
the user’s HP is down.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A desperate attack
that becomes more
powerful the less
HP the user has.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user flails about
aimlessly to attack.
It becomes more
powerful the less HP
the user has.
